sub_topic: Prove that the empty set is a subset of every set.
message_1: Let S be a set containing 8 elements. Determine whether the empty set is a subset of set S.
message_2: Yes, the empty set is a subset of set S. The empty set, denoted as âˆ… or {}, is a subset of every set, including set S. This is because the empty set contains no elements, so all of its elements (none) are also in set S.
